name: Denis Bouyssou
content: Home page of Denis Bouyssou Until the beginning of 2023, I was a CNRS researcher, working at LAMSADE. This is my academic page. I am now retired. Contents Publications Current Work Slides of various presentations Current Courses Miscellaneous (mostly non-scientific, mostly in French) Research Interests Decision Theory Operations Research Preference modelling Multiple Criteria Decision Making Last updated January 2023 Denis Bouyssou dbouyssou AT gmail DOT com Please note that I read my emails at most once a day. Please also note that I never answer Linkedin (or other such social networks) invitations.
